name: Playa Hotels & Resorts N.V.
description: Playa Hotels & Resorts N.V. is a leading owner, operator, and developer of all-inclusive resort properties located in beachfront destinations in Mexico and the Caribbean. Founded in 2013, Playa has rapidly expanded its portfolio to include over 20 resorts under well-known brands such as Hyatt Ziva, Hyatt Zilara, and the Sanctuary brand. The company focuses on delivering exceptional guest experiences through high-quality service, luxurious accommodations, and a variety of amenities that cater to families, couples, and groups. Playa's resorts are strategically located in prime tourist destinations, offering guests access to pristine beaches, vibrant local culture, and numerous recreational activities. The company is committed to sustainable practices, working to minimize its environmental impact while enhancing the communities where it operates. With a focus on growth, Playa aims to expand its portfolio through acquisitions and development, positioning itself as a key player in the hospitality industry. The company's mission is to provide a memorable vacation experience for every guest while maintaining a strong focus on hospitality excellence and operational efficiency.
